/usr/bin/c++   -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/test_gpu_convolve.dir/test_gpu_convolve.cpp.o CMakeFiles/test_gpu_convolve.dir/image_stack_utils.cpp.o  -o test_gpu_convolve  -L/opt/multiview/FourierConvolutionCUDALib/build/src -rdynamic /usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl -lrt -lboost_unit_test_framework ../src/libFourierConvolutionCUDALib.so /usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl -lrt /usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64/libcufft.so -lcuda -Wl,-rpath,/opt/multiview/FourierConvolutionCUDALib/build/src:/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64
